title: Enhancing CS Competency: Optimizing Socially Distanced Workplace Environments—Mathematics-Based Efficiency Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and data analysis skills, understanding of workplace safety regulations
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically evaluate compliance with social distancing by analyzing workspace layout data

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
